mapper.select:
select
,
from ( select m.*, rownum rn from SURVEY.MGMAPFIGURE m where not exists (select r.bizid from survey.file_move_record r where r.bizid = m.id) order by m.id ) re where re.rn = 1
select count(1) from SURVEY.MGMAPFIGURE m where not exists (select r.bizid from survey.file_move_record r where r.bizid = m.id)
